scripts.prisma:migrate: dotenv -e packages/database/.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && pnpm -F @micro/database exec prisma migrate dev'
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: dotenv -e packages/database/.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && pnpm -F @micro/database exec prisma migrate deploy'
scripts.prisma:migrate:status: dotenv -e packages/database/.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && pnpm -F @micro/database exec prisma migrate status'
scripts.prisma:studio: dotenv -e packages/database/.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && pnpm -F @micro/database exec prisma studio'
scripts.prisma:seed: dotenv -e packages/database/.env -- sh -c 'cd packages/database && pnpm -F @micro/database run seed'
